item.title: Vince Guaraldi Trio - Christmas Time Is Here
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of F. But it is a jazz song, so who really knows.
As performed by The Vince Guaraldi Trio
Okay...NOT the easiest song, and certainly not something you will use with beginners...however, this is a roadmap in the original Key that is playable with practice...and really, who doesn't want this in their repertoire?
Need to take it slower? Use the gear icon on the video to slow the speed!
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Bill Withers - Ain't No Sunshine
item.description:
Hey! Check my awesome stuff for merch at https://www.redbubble.com/people/Ukeledu/shop
-
¡Hey! Échale un ojo a mis molones artículos de merchan en https://www.redbubble.com/es/people/Ukeledu/shop
________________________
STRUMMING PATTERN / RASGUEO:
Main Riff / Riff principal: D D DUD DUD DUD D D DU D DU '' last part of the Riff / Última parte del Riff: D D D DU D DU (x2) Knowledge part / Parte de "I know": xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx...
D: Down / Hacia abajo U: Up / Hacia arriba x: Muted strigs (Down) / Cuerdas muteadas con la palma de la mano (hacia abajo)
________________________
Hey! If you liked this video, give me a like, subscribe and comment your doubts, suggestions or anything you want.
- ¡Hey! Si te ha gustado el vídeo, dame like, suscríbete y comenta tus dudas, sugerencias o lo que te apetezca.

item.title: Laurie London - He's Got the Whole World in His Hands
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
As performed by Laurie London
Original video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cqb3NSiSwoc
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com. The colored font matches Aquila KIDS ukulele strings.

item.title: Bobby Helms - Jingle Bell Rock
item.description:
For Educational Use. Best used with GCEA tuned ukuleles. Key of C. 13 chords (see video).
Chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com
